title: The Week of Sue Jackson: Adventures of a Senior Superhero
summary: Sue Jackson, a 68-year-old retired teacher, spends her week using her newfound superpowers to mentor and protect her community, discovering her abilities grow with her passion for helping others.
summaryGerman: Sue Jackson, eine 68-jährige pensionierte Lehrerin, verbringt ihre Woche damit, ihre neu entdeckten Superkräfte zu nutzen, um ihre Gemeinschaft zu betreuen und zu schützen, und entdeckt, dass ihre Fähigkeiten mit ihrer Leidenschaft für das Helfen anderer wachsen.
summaryDutch: Sue Jackson, een 68-jarige gepensioneerde lerares, besteedt haar week aan het gebruiken van haar nieuw verworven superkrachten om haar gemeenschap te begeleiden en te beschermen, en ontdekt dat haar vaardigheden groeien met haar passie voor het helpen van anderen.
summaryFrench: Sue Jackson, enseignante à la retraite de 68 ans, passe sa semaine à utiliser ses superpouvoirs nouvellement découverts pour encadrer et protéger sa communauté, découvrant que ses capacités augmentent avec sa passion pour aider autrui.

story.text: Sue discovers her superpowers of telepathy and super strength after a mysterious comet passes over her town. She uses these powers to resolve a conflict at the local park.
Encouraged by her success, Sue spends the day training to control her powers. She mentors local kids, teaching them the importance of using talents for good.
A local bank is robbed, and Sue uses her super strength to help the police catch the thieves, uncovering a deeper plot against her town.
Sue holds a community meeting to educate her neighbors on safety and how to look out for each other, using her telepathy to understand community concerns.
After rumors of another threat, Sue patrols the neighborhood, ensuring everyone feels secure and protected under her watch.
Taking a peaceful day off, Sue spends time with her grandchildren, sharing stories of her week and passing on lessons of bravery and kindness.
Reflecting on her heroic week, Sue realizes that age is just a number when it comes to making a difference. She plans to continue her superhero deeds, integrating them with her daily life.

ending: With every challenge she faced, Sue reminded everyone that heroes come in all ages.
moral: Age does not define one's ability to make a positive impact.
